This demo mirrors `demo/sharpener_demo.R` and shows the incremental pipeline
for both binomial and Cox outcomes.

```{r}
#| label: setup
#| include: false
suppressPackageStartupMessages({
  library(sharp)
  library(survival)
  library(magrittr)
  library(dplyr)
  library(ggplot2)
})

source("../R/00_functions.R")
source("../R/00_univariable_functions.R")
set.seed(1)
```

## Binomial example

```{r}
#| label: binomial-demo
n <- 200
p <- 20
x <- matrix(rnorm(n * p), nrow = n, ncol = p)
colnames(x) <- paste0("x", seq_len(p))

beta <- c(rep(1, 5), rep(0, p - 5))
linpred <- as.numeric(x %*% beta)
prob <- 1 / (1 + exp(-linpred))
y_bin <- rbinom(n, size = 1, prob = prob)

vs_bin <- sharp::VariableSelection(
  xdata = x,
  ydata = y_bin,
  family = "binomial",
  K = 20,
  seed = 1,
  n_cores = 1,
  verbose = FALSE
)

inc_bin <- IncrementalAnalysis(
  xdata = x,
  ydata = y_bin,
  stability = vs_bin,
  n_predictors = 10,
  k = 20,
  test_ratio = 0.3,
  ncores = 1,
  seed = 1,
  verbose = TRUE
)

# Plot multiple ROC tiers on a single panel
plot_incremental_roc(
  inc_bin,
  m = c(3, 5, 8),
  label_predictors = TRUE,
  label_style = "added"
)
```

## Wrapper: VariableSelection + univariableScreen

```{r}
#| label: wrapper-demo
both_bin <- runVariableSelectionAndUnivariable(
  xdata = x,
  ydata = y_bin,
  family = "binomial",
  variable_selection_args = list(K = 20, seed = 1, n_cores = 1, verbose = FALSE),
  univariable_args = list(ncores = 1, seed = 1, verbose = FALSE)
)

# Comparison table (top signals by univariable p-value)
both_bin$comparison %>%
  dplyr::arrange(p_value_min) %>%
  dplyr::slice_head(n = 10)

# Volcano plot from univariable results
plotVolcano(both_bin$univariable, title = "Univariable screen (binomial)")

# Compare variable selection vs univariable significance
both_bin$comparison_plot
```

## Cox survival example

```{r}
#| label: cox-demo
set.seed(2)

n2 <- 250
p2 <- 20
x2 <- matrix(rnorm(n2 * p2), nrow = n2, ncol = p2)
colnames(x2) <- paste0("x", seq_len(p2))

beta2 <- c(rep(0.7, 5), rep(0, p2 - 5))
linpred2 <- as.numeric(x2 %*% beta2)

base_rate <- 0.08
cens_rate <- 0.05

time_event <- rexp(n2, rate = base_rate * exp(linpred2))
time_cens <- rexp(n2, rate = cens_rate)

time_obs <- pmin(time_event, time_cens)
event <- as.integer(time_event <= time_cens)
y_surv <- survival::Surv(time_obs, event)

vs_surv <- sharp::VariableSelection(
  xdata = x2,
  ydata = y_surv,
  family = "cox",
  K = 20,
  seed = 2,
  n_cores = 1,
  verbose = FALSE
)

inc_surv <- IncrementalAnalysis(
  xdata = x2,
  ydata = y_surv,
  stability = vs_surv,
  n_predictors = 10,
  k = 20,
  test_ratio = 0.3,
  ncores = 1,
  seed = 2,
  verbose = TRUE
)

plot_incremental_survival(inc_surv, m_select = "best_test")$plot
```

```{r}
plot_incremental_roc(inc_surv, m_select = "best_test",time = 10)

```
